title: NOX for seeds
prompt: Alex is on the final leg of his voyage. After spending such a long time in space, he is very eager to reach home, and wants to find a token of remembrance for his wife, whom he misses dearly. He decides to get a SEED of her favourite flowers. However, thereâ€™s a challenge. Forsythia is only found on planet NOX, known for its brutal and xenophobic species. Help Alex get that SEED!
author: s4yCh33se!
